text: Kremlin Mill is an unincorporated community in Butler County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. ==History== A post office called Kremlin Mills was in operation from 1878 until 1880, and a post office called Kremlin from 1887 until 1888. The community took its name from a nearby gristmill of the same name which in turn was named after the Moscow Kremlin in Russia. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Butler County, Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Kremlin Mill, Missouri
